The disenshittified internet starts with loyal "user agents" (permalink) There's one overwhelmingly common mistake that people make about enshittification: assuming that the contagion is the result of the Great Forces of History, or that it is the inevitable end-point of any kind of for-profit online world. In other words, they class enshittification as an ideological phenomenon, rather than as a material phenomenon.
